Text: #G11# As a developer, I want to have the subdomain beta.nsf.gov be set up, so that I can deploy a beta site to it.
#G11# As a stakeholder, I want to see the results of user research, so that I can determine if the CMS is right for me.
Action: See The Results Of User Research

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to have a prioritized list of features and elements of a future social element page, so that I can work with the engineers to determine feasibility.
Action: Have A Prioritized List Of Element
Have A Prioritized List Of Features Of A Social, Future Element Page

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to determine a design direction for the beta social page, so that we can implement a beta site quickly without established brand guidelines.
Action: Determine A Design Direction For The Social, Beta Page

Text: #G11# As a content editor, I want to be able to easily find content, so that I can edit it.
#G11# As a user, I want to add a video to my article.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have an updated roadmap document, so that I can see prioritized areas to focus on for the next few months and beyond.
#G11# As a researcher, I want to develop the user research protocol for internal workflows, so that we can begin testing against a CMS prototype.
Action: Develop The User Research Protocol For Internal Workflows

Text: #G11# As an NSF employee, I want to have high-level strategy recommendations to implement in conjunction with the new CMS.
Action: Implement In Conjunction With The New Cms

Text: #G11# As a content designer, I want to demonstrate the value of user-centered content design to ensure it's an integral part of our recommendations.
Action: Demonstrate The Value Of User, Centered Content Design 'S An Integral Part Of Recommendations

Text: #G11# As a team member, I want to know when the mid-point checkin is and what will be covered, so that I can plan accordingly.
#G11# As a web recruiter manager, I want to confirm the recruiter is set up and working properly, so that I can deploy it on more pages.
#G11# As a VisualDesigner, I want to create a moodboard to aid with visual design concepts for the nsf.gov website, so that we can discuss different design concepts with stakeholders.
Action: Aid With Visual Design Concepts For The Nsf.Gov Website

Text: #G11# As a user researcher, I want to make sure the correct NSF people are invited to user interviews, so that they can observe the interviews and make recommendations accordingly.
#G11# As a user researcher, I want to begin drafting a research plan, so that I can begin recruiting participants.
#G11# As a content editor, I want to be able to add videos from Brightcove.
#G11# As a team member, I want to know what visual design related tasks we might need to plan for this sprint, so that I can assign tasks as necessary.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to see how the user recruitment form looks and behaves on a sample page, so that I can understand the impact the recruitment will have on the NSF page.
Action: Behaves The User Recruitment Form On A Sample Page

Text: #G11# As a site administrator, I want to understand how other similar organizations are handling visual design, so that I can make informed decisions about what appears to work well and what doesn't.
#G11# As an NSF employee, I want to know where the initial in-person meeting will be, so that I can plan on attending.
#G11# As a team member, I want to know when meetings are, so that I can plan accordingly.
#G11# As a team member, I want to understand how work moves between UX/content > visual design > front end dev for a sprint cycle.
Action: Visual Understand How Work Moves Between Ux Front, > End Dev For A Sprint Cycle
